feed.title: BIP [104]: Replace Transaction Fees with Data, Discussion Draft 0.2.9

entry.title: BIP [104]: Replace Transaction Fees with Data, Discussion Draft 0.2.9
entry.summary: In this communication thread on the bitcoin-dev mailing list, Ahmed Zsales proposes a long-term solution to replace mining rewards and transaction fees. He shares a discussion draft of BIP [104] for feedback. Btc Drak notes that one cannot assign their own BIP numbers and must use the form BIP-myproposal. Later, Angel Leon confirms that privacy issues are covered in the proposal. A link to the discussion draft is included in the conversation thread.
